title: Travel & Tourism
part1: What is your favorite place to visit?
How do people in your country usually travel?
What are the benefits of traveling?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a memorable trip you have taken.
cue_card_points: and explain why it was memorable.

part3: How has tourism changed in recent years?
What impact does tourism have on local communities?
Do you think people will travel more or less in the future?
